info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Habersham, south central Rabun and west central Oconee Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Clayton, or near Lake Rabun, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tiger, Tallulah Falls, Lake Rabun, Lakemont, Tallulah Gorge State Park, Long Creek, Seed Lake and Turnerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
